title: When Vi Ults and Ulting Sion...
body: Of course, Sion just keeps running, meanwhile Vi chases you until you stop. I mean no guarantee it will happen but...ulted into two team fights my last game and Vi ulted me and I took off with her, funniest shit ever. Second time I carried her into the shop and the game ended shortly after.

replies.body: Why was Vi ulting a tank?

> Why was Vi ulting a tank?

^
I don't even care about that, she got the kill both times, the only good thing for us was it just completely took her away from her group.

I've did that yesterday! Bastard carried me halfway across the map before I finally hit him. Took so long to reach him that my Q actually went off cooldown while I was flying and was able to get away before his passive killed me.
lol Someoe record it so I can see it on Random Lol moments.

I tried this.

What happens is that she catches you before you speed up, so she does her animation while you run. Pretty buggy
Try ulting one that is running by at max speed
Someone needs to make a video of this now.  That concept is more kek worthy than "A spectral warden dug a big meaty hook into my back.  But then I ate oranges and was K."
